ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Contains miscellaneous functions useful in biostatistics, mostly univariate and multivariate testing procedures with a special emphasis on permutation tests. Many functions intend to simplify user's life by shortening existing procedures or by implementing plotting functions that can be used with as many methods from different packages as possible.

Contains miscellaneous functions useful in biostatistics, mostly univariate and multivariate testing procedures with a special emphasis on permutation tests. Many functions intend to simplify user's life by shortening existing procedures or by implementing plotting functions that can be used with as many methods from different packages as possible.

name: r-rvaidememoire
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.9-83-12" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-rvaidememoire
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/RVAideMemoire_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/RVAideMemoire/RVAideMemoire_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: ec4b02384e4c5903d94312dde6b05aa6ddd0ee92a0aa73983d1a42271ef4a2e0

build:
  number: 1
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-factominer
    - r-mass
    - r-ade4 >=1.7_8
    - r-boot
    - r-car
    - r-cramer
    - r-lme4 >=1.0_4
    - r-mixomics
    - r-nnet
    - r-pls
    - r-pspearman
    - r-vegan >=2.4_3
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-factominer
    - r-mass
    - r-ade4 >=1.7_8
    - r-boot
    - r-car
    - r-cramer
    - r-lme4 >=1.0_4
    - r-mixomics
    - r-nnet
    - r-pls
    - r-pspearman
    - r-vegan >=2.4_3

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('RVAideMemoire')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('RVAideMemoire')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=RVAideMemoire
  license: GPL-2.0-only
  summary: Contains miscellaneous functions useful in biostatistics, mostly univariate and multivariate testing procedures with a special emphasis on permutation tests. Many functions intend to simplify user's life by shortening existing procedures or by implementing plotting functions that can be used with as many methods
    from different packages as possible.
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Encoding: latin1
# Package: RVAideMemoire
# Type: Package
# Title: Testing and Plotting Procedures for Biostatistics
# Version: 0.9-73
# Date: 2019-03-26
# Author: Maxime Herve
# Maintainer: Maxime Herve <maxime.herve@univ-rennes1.fr>
# Imports: ade4 (>= 1.7-8), boot, car, cramer, FactoMineR, graphics, grDevices, lme4 (>= 1.0-4), MASS, mixOmics, nnet, pls, pspearman, stats, utils, vegan (>= 2.4-3)
# Suggests: dgof, emmeans, ordinal, survival
# Description: Contains miscellaneous functions useful in biostatistics, mostly univariate and multivariate testing procedures with a special emphasis on permutation tests. Many functions intend to simplify user's life by shortening existing procedures or by implementing plotting functions that can be used with as many methods from different packages as possible.
# License: GPL-2
# LazyLoad: yes
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2019-03-26 08:08:18 UTC; maherve
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2019-03-26 09:06:10 UTC
